name: Fragments (itch) (Lovliina)
description:
Gather fragments and avoid strange creatures to escape from the abyss.

---------------

Started out with a great idea, something along the lines of curing our guys depression. Limbo was definetly our inspiration material.

Was supposed to have lots of dialogue options.. Unfortunatly life circumstances of team members prevented us in making the best that we were capable of. But that does not mean dead end. The original idea was still great. And might be finished in a future iteration.
